name: fullstack-app-template
description: Production-ready full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build

author: AI Development Standards
